topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack® Carrier Grade (Alpha): Create a Virtual Router During Installation

body.p: You can configure a virtual router for your cloud using an installer file in the installation kit.

li.p: Copy the router.qcow2 to /var/lib/libvirt/images folder on the KVM host.
The VM should be up in few min. Login to virt-manager to get to the VM or use virsh console <vm> from kvm host.
Use a tool, such as Virtual Machine Manager, to make sure that the network is configured with br-kvm for NIC1 and br-ctl for NIC2.
Make sure that you can connect to an external NTP server and check that you can connect to an external network after exporting the proxy.
